routes.documentation: Primary flight/vehicle telemetry data. Contains position, velocity, flight parameters, engine data, and controls. Recommended polling rate: 60Hz.

responses.body:
{
  "valid": 1,
  "X": {{faker 'number.float' min=-10000 max=10000 precision=0.01}},
  "Y": {{faker 'number.float' min=100 max=5000 precision=0.01}},
  "Z": {{faker 'number.float' min=-10000 max=10000 precision=0.01}},
  "Vx": {{faker 'number.float' min=-50 max=50 precision=0.01}},
  "Vy": {{faker 'number.float' min=-20 max=20 precision=0.01}},
  "Vz": {{faker 'number.float' min=-50 max=50 precision=0.01}},
  "Wx": {{faker 'number.float' min=-0.5 max=0.5 precision=0.001}},
  "Wy": {{faker 'number.float' min=-0.5 max=0.5 precision=0.001}},
  "Wz": {{faker 'number.float' min=-0.5 max=0.5 precision=0.001}},
  "AoA": {{faker 'number.float' min=-5 max=15 precision=0.1}},
  "AoS": {{faker 'number.float' min=-3 max=3 precision=0.1}},
  "IAS": {{faker 'number.float' min=250 max=600 precision=0.1}},
  "TAS": {{faker 'number.float' min=280 max=650 precision=0.1}},
  "M": {{faker 'number.float' min=0.4 max=0.9 precision=0.01}},
  "H": {{faker 'number.float' min=500 max=4000 precision=0.1}},
  "Ny": {{faker 'number.float' min=0.8 max=2.5 precision=0.01}},
  "throttle": {{faker 'number.float' min=0.7 max=1.0 precision=0.01}},
  "RPM": {{faker 'number.float' min=2200 max=2800 precision=1}},
  "manifold_pressure": {{faker 'number.float' min=0.8 max=1.2 precision=0.01}},
  "power": {{faker 'number.float' min=0.7 max=1.0 precision=0.01}},
  "flaps": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=1 precision=0.1}},
  "gear": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=1 precision=0.1}},
  "airbrake": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=1 precision=0.1}},
  "compass": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=360 precision=0.1}},
  "fuel": {{faker 'number.float' min=200 max=800 precision=1}},
  "time": 1770825735
}
responses.label: Flying - Dynamic Values

routes.documentation: Cockpit instrumentation data. Contains instrument panel readings like speed indicators, engine instruments, attitude, altimeter, and clock. Recommended polling rate: 10Hz.

responses.body:
{
  "valid": 1,
  "type": 0,
  "speed": {{faker 'number.float' min=250 max=600 precision=1}},
  "pedal_position": {{faker 'number.float' min=0.5 max=1.0 precision=0.01}},
  "rpm_hour": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=10 precision=0.1}},
  "rpm_min": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=60 precision=0.1}},
  "manifold_pressure": {{faker 'number.float' min=0.8 max=1.2 precision=0.01}},
  "oil_temp": {{faker 'number.float' min=80 max=120 precision=0.1}},
  "water_temp": {{faker 'number.float' min=70 max=110 precision=0.1}},
  "aviahorizon_roll": {{faker 'number.float' min=-30 max=30 precision=0.1}},
  "aviahorizon_pitch": {{faker 'number.float' min=-15 max=15 precision=0.1}},
  "altitude_hour": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=10 precision=0.1}},
  "altitude_min": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=60 precision=0.1}},
  "altitude_10k": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=10 precision=0.1}},
  "vertical_speed": {{faker 'number.float' min=-10 max=10 precision=0.1}},
  "compass": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=360 precision=0.1}},
  "compass1": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=360 precision=0.1}},
  "clock_hour": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=12 precision=0.1}},
  "clock_min": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=60 precision=0.1}},
  "clock_sec": {{faker 'number.float' min=0 max=60 precision=0.1}}
}
responses.label: Flying - Dynamic Values
